mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_tbl (productCode, productCount, id) VALUES (#{cart.productCode}, #{cart.productCount}, #{cart.id});
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cart_tbl WHERE id = #{id} AND productCode = #{productCode};

SELECT ct.cartCode, pt.productCode, pt.productImage, pt.productName, pt.productInfo, pt.price, ct.productCount, (pt.price * ct.productCount) AS totalPrice, ct.id FROM seenema.product_tbl pt RIGHT JOIN seenema.cart_tbl ct ON pt.productCode = ct.productCode WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart_tbl WHERE productCode = #{productCode} AND id = #{id};
